page.title: 07MULTICULTURAL EDUCATION 2
page.content: { Easter}brought an opportunity to study the life of{Jesus Christ,}to hear again the stories he had told and think about his teachings. I did not know anything about{Judaism}until a class performed a play about{Purim.} They also showed us a collection of Jewish items including the scrolls of law from a synagogue and clothing worn during worship. We marked the{Chinese {New Year}with stories, songs, a painted dragon with 15 children inside and attempts at Chinese writing. It is not a religious festival, but it is important to my Chinese friends and we enjoy celebrating with them. {Ramadan is an important time of fasting for {Muslim}people. I do not eat my school dinner at the start of Ramadan as a sign of my faith. {Eid}comes at the end of Ramadan. At school we have a party, games and decorate the hall.
